TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void BulletedListEventHandler(object sender, BulletedListEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed BulletedListEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub BulletedListEventHandler(sender As Object, e As BulletedListEventArgs)
public delegate void BulletedListEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, BulletedListEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件資料的型別 引數。

span.span: The argument of type that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示方法，處理 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立委派，就可以識別即將處理方法事件控制項。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event of a control. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的事件處理常式事件控制項。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 按一下清單項目時，訊息會顯示在頁面上的控制項。When a list item is clicked, a message is displayed in a control on the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/CS/bulletedlistclickeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[BulletedListClickEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/BulletedListClickEvent/VB/bulletedlistclickeventvb.aspx#1)]
